cause.description:
Kids Across America Kamps are sports camps committed to reaching the inner-city youth of our nation with the love and power of Jesus. KAA is revolutionizing inner-city America by reaching out in Christ's love to some 6,300 urban campers and 845 leaders annually from over 496 cities in 33 states. Our mission is to build leaders by encouraging, equipping and empowering urban youth and their mentors through Christian sports camping.
1. Love Jesus
2. Love Kids
cause.mission: Spread the love of Jesus Christ to inner city youth.
cause.name: Kids Across America
